sections.heading: Expenditure; inclusion in budget
sections.text: The amount to be expended for the ensuing year or biennial period shall be fixed at the time of making up the annual or biennial budget required by law, and the same shall be included in the budget.SourceLaws 1921, c. 187, ยง 2, p. 700;C.S.1922, ยง 4393;C.S.1929, ยง 18-
